Review Text: Amazing experience, best vegan restaurant in amsterdam by far. So refreshing to have a place to experience creative cooking and refreshing tastes! Finally not another vegan junk food place. Also great hospitality, small and intimate atmosphere. Thank you, will be back for sure!

Name: Bonboon
Review Text: We had a lovely evening in the Bonboon. Everything was perfect - delicious plant-based food, very friendly service and a great location at the water. We will for sure come back!

Name: Bonboon
Review Text: Great food, great atmosphere. You can feel the passion as you chat with the owner and staff on how they prepare and serve their delightful and mouth watering food!

Name: Bonboon
Review Text: The best ingredients for enjoying superfood: a stubborn woman without catering background, no menu choice, only freshly picked vegetables, no plastic money, and an inspiring harbor environment... If you're ever in Amsterdam for one day, don't miss this one!

Name: Bonboon
Review Text: So glad this fabulous vegan restaurant is open again. We missed it. Great food, top wines: an absolute must for vegans and vegan-curious folk visiting Amsterdam.
